ModMetaData.name: Smelt Trash
ModMetaData.description: Allows the player to smelt bags of trash into steel at campfires and smelters. If Fertile Fields (by Rainbeau Flambe and Jamaican Castle) is installed, also adds two recipes to process Reclaimed Biopacks into fertilizer directly. If Medieval Overhaul is installed, trash bags will return iron ore when smelted, instead of steel ingots. These additions are intended to improve compatibility and the overall gameplay of Vanilla Recycling Expanded.
